name: edge-ai
description: Models for edge AI inference, embeddings, and benchmarking

models.name: nomic-embed-text
models.purpose: Text embeddings for semantic similarity (768 dimensions)

models.name: mxbai-embed-large
models.purpose: Large text embeddings for high-quality semantic search (1024 dimensions)

notes: nomic-embed-text and mxbai-embed-large are embedding models for Harper benchmarks
llama3.2 and mistral provide different performance/quality trade-offs for classification
All models work with Harper's unified InferenceEngine
